description: Ash`s Frogadier is the evolved form of Ash`s Froakie. It evolved during a battle with Saizo`s Barbaracle. As a result of evolving, it learned Aerial Ace. Bonnie was disappointed that she didn`t get to see it evolve and wanted it to turn back into a Froakie so she could see it evolve.
name: Gekogashira (Satoshi)
